amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow military personnel and their dependents overseas to use their own funds to obtain abortion services in military hospitals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 107-218 to restore equal access to health services at overseas military hospitals to servicemen and women and their dependents stationed overseas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 217 (Roll no. 357).
